display_name: PROMIS Sleep-Related Impairment: Felt irritable because of poor sleep (past 7 days)
description:
Item from the PROMIS Sleep Related Impairment instrument. [Yu L et al, 2012 (PMID: 22250775)](https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC3261577/)

[Search for all PROMIS SRI variables within this dataset](https://sleepdata.org/datasets/bestair/variables?search=promissri)
